ratings.notes: proposed_contextual_controlled<TAB>4<TAB>5<TAB>3<TAB>4<TAB>Short note: Balances context and persona but lacks some naturalness in tone, could be more direct to match the Gatekeeper's suspicion.

baseline_no_context<TAB>2<TAB>1<TAB>5<TAB>3<TAB>Baseline response is accurate regarding protocol but fails on persona consistency and context relevance as it ignores guard duties, which should be considered in the interaction with a stranger.
